title.bibl: Russkii Viestnik, (Russian Herald), Apr. 11, 1924. Lectures about the Moscow Art Theatre and its Artists.

div.bibl: Russkii Viestnik, (Russian Herald), Apr. 11, 1924. LECTURES ABOUT THE MOSCOW ART THEATRE AND ITS ARTISTS.

body.p: At the studio of Miss Grace Hickox on Michigan avenue, the lecturer Helen Valkova will lecture in English about the Moscow Art Theatre, its history and rise, about the plays, authors and also about the artists of the M. A. T. At the same studio, on Friday, April 11, 1924, the troupe of the Moscow Art Theatre will be entertained by the English friends and admirers of our talented compatriots.
